item.title: Freeze Engine v0.4
item.description: Hey everyone! It’s been quite some time since I talked about my 2D Engine. This release isn’t anything big but I think it’s a pretty good one since the start of the engine. I am planning on adding more features to the engine (for v0.5). Let’s get into what’s new and some problems as well. New Features Let’s start with some new stuff, there aren’t much but these will do:

item.title: Links
item.description: If you have any issues related to the Website or my YouTube channel then you can contact me through my email: Email Other Links: GitHub 2D Engine (C++ and OpenGL) YouTube
